name: Super Plasma
description:
Super Plasma is an adventure game where you go through levels and fight enemy AI, and the goal of the game is to save the world from a crazy mad scientist, who created a super plasma weapon that can destroy earth in one hit, fight your way to this crazy scientist's lair, and fight him to save the world!

Made for the Brackeys GameJam!

Made by : KhaledFarah & Bader
